title: New Strong Buy Stocks for January 21st
full_text: New Strong Buy Stocks for January 21st. BAYRY, DAKT, ZTO, LRLCY and AVAH have been added to the Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy) List on January 21, 2026..
